website_summaries.verdict: An excellent mid-range bass that looks great and plays well but offers great value for money.
pros: Features a solid basswood body and maple neck
Powerful split single coil pickups have a beefy sound that's perfect for heavier music, though they're versatile enough to work for various genres
cons: A handful of users report issues with fret buzz

customer_reviews.title: Super bass guitar
customer_reviews.text: Okay seriously, for the price, this bass is excellent! It looks and feels excellent. It sounds great too. I was surprised when there was no pickup switch but then realized the control knobs adjust the mix. I can't imagine a better bass anywhere in this range. I play guitar but needed/wanted a bass. I'm perfectly pleased with this bass guitar and recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Claxton

customer_reviews.title: Great value in an inexpensive bass guitar!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent low-priced bass guitar. It did require some set up as the action was a bit high. However, the quality of the instrument is great and the active controls allow a lot of tone shaping. If you are a expert player you may want more than this model but for beginner thru intermediate players-this will be with you for years. My second Yamaha guitar and I feel both have excellent tone, playability, and value. Looked at many inexpensive guitars before buying this and do not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Cibula

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was awful and not substantial for a delicate instrument. When I went to set the bass up, I found that one of the string length adjustment screws was cross-threaded so badly that I couldn't properly adjust the intonation. Then, I went to adjust the action and the bridge saddle allen screws were stripped out and wouldn't move at all. That's when I opted to return the thing. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Perretta

customer_reviews.title: Nice/not nice
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar great tone just 1 thing it came with a bit of a knock on the head
customer_reviews.author: barry reid

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha makes very fine instruments.
customer_reviews.text: Yamaha makes fine instruments. I have purchased many Yamaha acoustic guitars, basses, trumpets and saxophones and I have never been disappointed with the quality and performance. This new bass is setup well and plays very good with the active or passive signals. The fit an finish is better than my MIM and MIA Fender Jazz basses.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Quality instrument with great tone.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bass. I own a music venue and play the acoustic guitar. My guitar is a Martin and it was a lot more expensive than this guitar but I have no desire to buy a more expensive bass. It has great tone and I love the build quality. Do not hesitate to purchase this instrument. It rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Uriah Werner

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this no-nonsense bass for anyone looking to start out ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing this bass for several months now, and although I am relatively amateur at the instrument, I have been very impressed with the quality of the sound and the craftsmanship. The body of the bass is nothing fancy, but that is expected given the very reasonable price. The electronics seem top notch (which makes sense given Yamaha's reputation). Overall, I would highly recommend this no-nonsense bass for anyone looking to start out playing bass without spending your retirement savings on it.
customer_reviews.author: JTStockwell

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding and great range of tones
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to bass but not to stringed fretted instruments and this bass is an amazing value. The quality of construction is excellent and the range of tones it can produce makes it incredibly versatile. I got the black body which looks great with the dark rosewood fretboard. The only thing to be aware of is that the first one I received came in a very damaged box - it was like Nearly Headless Nick and had been taped back together. I returned it and the replacement came in excellent shape. The return was hassle free so I wouldn't hesitate to order an instrument from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer Of Things I like

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had an acoustic electric bass that I thought would be good to play in a big setting like a church. The sound was horrible on that one, so I decided to look around for a replacement. I came across this Yamaha at a good price point. The EQ/sound features sounded interesting and they do actually make a difference in the sound. I like the quality of the bass. It is not a heavy bass. I love the Mist Green color as everyone thinkss it is some kind of Grey. I think this was a good choice in a bass I practice with and use a few times a month at the church.
customer_reviews.author: David Alicea

customer_reviews.title: Great bass guitar, even for a beginner like me.
customer_reviews.text: This bass can produce a lot of different sounds that I'm sure I'll grow into in time. But for now, the neck feels great and I feel myself progressing. Truly a great bass for the money. However, I would have given it 5 stars if it had come properly setup. It plays fine, but could use a little tweaking on the truss rod and action...
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and playing bass with some minor gripes
customer_reviews.text: Received the bass and the neck was way out of adjustment. The location of the truss rod is accessible, but a bit of a pain. The tuners are not that great and based on how they are set on the headstock, I will have to do a little research on what I can replace them with (if it is worth the effort or not). Fret work was really great for an inexpensive bass. Nothing sprouting and no bites on the hand. Neck feels good and I like the balance of it. Really like the look of the old violin sunburst and it plays great (now that it is adjusted).
customer_reviews.author: SithTracy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: (The bass for the review is shown on the right of the image attached, all black) This is a fantastic instrument for beginners, intermediates, and even professionals. I only had to adjust the trussrod slightly out of the box, but I believe there is an appropriate Allen wrench that comes in the kit for that. You get beyond what you pay for. I have zero complaints. This is a sturdy instrument that will outlast its price. I've been using it for a month now and it is beyond fantastic. Great strings come with it too. Mine was basically ready to play right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Shahein R. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Stellar Bass
customer_reviews.text: My youngest boy got this bass with his lawn mowing money. It is a very good quality instrument at a beginner budget price. He loves it. it sounds amazing and is well built. Very solid bass.
customer_reviews.author: Technology Instructor

customer_reviews.title: It’s your bass, you decide how great it can be. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I AM new to bass. However, I play keyboard, drums, a little acoustic guitar, and I sing. So I pick up instruments quicker than regular Joes I like to believe. This Yamaha Bass is very nice. It’s a nice sturdy weight. It feels slick and fragile, yet I feel like If it ever accidentally took a beating that it would be more than strong enough to handle it. It sounds good and really just depends on your amp/speaker. I would DEFINITELY recommend getting this bass if you’re new or even if you just want another bass. I haven’t found a problem with it yet and I don’t think I should. Thanks Yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin R.

customer_reviews.title: Keep the bass just change the electronis and bridge youll hear the difference
customer_reviews.text: The workmanship on this bass guitar is very good i believe it as good as the 2000 dollar basses out their (really!) . I really wasnt to impressed With the pickups . It lacked focus but what do you expect for 650 dollars. Im keeping the bass because its built solid but I'm upgrading the pick ups and electronics with aguilars and for good measure im replacing the bridge as well with a hipshot bridge. The original electronis and pick ups are fine if you just jamming in a garage but im a performing musician and supplement my income performing and i did not hear the tone that would sound well live for the type of music i play.
customer_reviews.author: Jose ines aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Mechanical build quality good - electrical, not so good
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with bass overall. However, immediately noticed volume potentiometer was "scratchy". As annoyance with quality defect grew, eventually requested return. Seller (Kraft) was dodgy and continually gave me the run around. Ended up resolving QA defect on my own time/money as vendor was terrible to deal with. Conclusion: Overall good bass - excellent if you get one with better quality electronics. Vendor was terrible to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bass for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bass is a really great, cheap, and beginner friendly bass. I've had this bass for two months now and it has been great. It has great pickup and sound features. The only problem is that the strings would ring out on some of the frets when it first came. But after some minor adjustments it worked like a charm. Recommended for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amy James

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm probably not the best judge of how good this is as an instrument since I am a beginner, but it looks amazing in person. I bought the old violin finish and it just looks and feels like a really high-quality piece. It's also very comfortable to hold/play. If you are also a beginner, do yourself a favor and restring it with Ernie Ball Slinky Flatwound Cobalt strings of a lighter gauge. The difference in playability is night and day. Because they're flatwound, they won't kill your fingertips. The lighter gauge helps to reduce the amount of finger pressure you need to apply which will minimize fret buzz.
customer_reviews.author: kevco

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I had reservations about going to five string with this Bass forget it it is wonderful. it's the lightest touch base I've ever had I got an aria pro a fender jazz among them. Sounds terrific the switch EQ really works quite well and almost any setting you can use with anything finger pick whatever! I was really looking serious at the 505 but glad that I want with the 305 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Arrived obviously broken
customer_reviews.text: The Mid EQ controller pretty much just flops around in it's housing, and the volume control works as an on/off switch, there's no adjustment. My first brand new instrument was a total disappointment....nice going, Yamaha, I guess I'll go see what Fender is doing for five or six hundred bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This electric bass guitar is fabulous
customer_reviews.text: he likes the look and feel AND the sound is phenomenal! For an advanced beginner it gives great perks for the money. he adores playing it and has already purchased some accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Delores A Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bass at an Excellent Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Such an incredible instrument at this price point! Lots of options for the HH active configuration, and a really silky smooth neck. Mine had no fret buzz right out of the box and didn’t require a huge set-up. I can see why this bass is often mentioned as one of the best “beginner” basses. Honestly, it feels a whole lot better than even some of the expensive instruments I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.author: AJD3

customer_reviews.title: It is an amazing bass
customer_reviews.text: It was one of the best out of the box basses and it was really easy to setup. It came with a Allen wrench that adjusts the string height and you might have to fiddle with it to get your perfect height. The bridge was setup almost perfect just you have to mess with the height of the string previously mentioned. As of sound it was amazing! Sense it is a pj style bass, you can switch between the Precision style pickup and the jazz style pickup and for the people who do t know that changes the sound majorly. Overall this bass was amazing for the price and has the production quality of a fender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Great Vibrations!
customer_reviews.text: Great bass for the price! Feels good, sounds great! Good beginner-intermediate bass.. I’ve been playing for over 15 years and it’s rare to have an active eq built in... lotta fun! Only downside is the 9v batteries for the pickups tend to die quickly. I would suggest taking it out after you play. I wanted it in black originally, but these things fly off the shelf so I got one in the fire mist green... which turned out to be not disappointing at all!! Beautiful curves and easy to play! Enjoy! 🤘
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this guitar
customer_reviews.text: I love this guitar! I have been playing the bass for over 40 years and I have all types. I put this bass up there with my music man for a lot less money, I play gospel music now and this bass is great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great Bass for Beginner
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great beginner base! I was a bit worried it wouldn’t make it through shipping. It actually came in perfectly fine. Nothing was broken which was pretty surprising considering the way it was packaged. The crafstmanship of the guitar is pretty solid. Sound quality is decent. Overall a good buy for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Persephonie

customer_reviews.title: Colors were off but a great bass
customer_reviews.text: This bass is amazing and definitely worth the money. When I was buying this bass I liked the black matte type look of it in the picture. When it delivered it was just a black glossy look so if your getting the black bass version just know that it’s not matte it’s solid black and glossy.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: 3rd party sellers price gouge
customer_reviews.text: I have a Yamaha 504, excellent bass. I paid $499 for the 305 goes for $350, 174 is ? $199. The 3rd party sellers are ridiculous. $1250 for what I paid $499,....shop around , American musical supply great prices and excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shaw Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Made my music loving teen happy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter after reading all the great reviews. First she loved the look. all smiles! Second when she plugged it in at church, she plays bass for the worship band, and started to play it on the sound system there, its sounded great! Shes thrilled, and because she is so am I.
customer_reviews.author: James Stockstill

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha makes great bass guitars.
customer_reviews.text: First one I received was cracked on the back by the 1/4" jack but it played superbly. Amazon makes returns painless so a new one arrived in a couple days. This one is cosmetically flawless but did not play as well. After hours of dialing in, it's close but I sort of wish I had kept the busted one. I have nothing but good things to say about this bass.
customer_reviews.author: My two cents.

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality at a beginner's price
customer_reviews.text: I like the build quality. I am just returning to playing so I purchased this bass just to get started. It's great quality and needed no additional adjustments to make it payable. I purchased this used and the instrument is in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: JWP2nd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bass
customer_reviews.text: I own three Yamaha Bass guitars all are great in their own way. Yamaha Bass guitars are under rated but the few of us that realize how good they are have a great Bass in our hands!! This one is exceptional for price, construction, fit, and form! Other than setting it up for the action I like which has to be done every guitar for everyone that plays. Go buy this Bass!!
customer_reviews.author: BAT

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be more satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box this thing was super playable. It feels good, construction is solid, and the neck is fast and smooth. You can achieve a wide range of tone, especially with the passive/active selector. It’s a pleasure to play any style.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This is very good bass for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing for 15 years. This is only my third bass and my first brand new one at that. Great tone, nice balance and awesome features. I did however have some issues with the set up and getting rid of fret noise. All is well now. I love this bass.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: must buy bass
customer_reviews.text: I got the tobacco sunburst color option and I must say this bass is incredible for the price! You can not go wrong with this bass as your first bass at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Nice bass
customer_reviews.text: I love this bass guitar. I play acoustic and electric guitar. I wanted a bass for my home recordings. Nice tone, finish and price. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest B. Wagstaff

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha bass
customer_reviews.text: Glad I know how to setup a bass. The neck relief, intonation and string height was way off. Also pickup height was way off. Sounds great and neck feel is good
customer_reviews.author: J. Hedin

customer_reviews.title: well worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: great value for a beginner getting into the world of bass.
customer_reviews.author: Mud Man

customer_reviews.title: My order
customer_reviews.text: When i first purchase this item, it was sounding great now all off sudden it sounds like crap. I understand its takes a 9 volt battery, and all the 9 volts batteries i have here are all brand new, and it still sounds like crap. I'm starting to think the seller sold me a use bass guitar. What i don't understand that it come's equip with an equalizer. It had to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Prestoncurry

customer_reviews.title: Great Bass
customer_reviews.text: This bass was purchased for my grandson. He loves it and says it’s a massive upgrade over his Ibanez. Needed only slight setup to lower the action. Fit and finish was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good starter bass guitar.
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old son has been quite pleased with this starter bass guitar. He has been playing it multiple times a day and enjoying it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Ethasp

customer_reviews.title: Bass guitar purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bass guitar's carrying case was not included in the shipment as the original advertising photo shows.
customer_reviews.author: barmax4537

customer_reviews.title: A quality instrument for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This bass is extremely well made, a comfortable neck and quality frets plus a rosewood fingerboard. Everything is well finished off and it looks great. I really like the sound, we play Americana music and I can get a good mellow tone, not tried it for slap type bass though. Yamaha have a winner here, exceptional value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: george h mason

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with a case , but it is a great guitar
customer_reviews.text: The TRBX 304 is a fantastic choice for a first time or intermediate bass guitar. It sounds great, its easy to play and I have no complaints. I purchased the black finish and it is flawless. Thank you, Yamaha!
customer_reviews.author: James R

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how it sounds as it just arrived, but it is exceptionally beautiful. I'll update the review later after I know more about how it sounds.... after Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great bass for the price. The seller was fast and packed the guitar well. I have enjoyed playing this for months. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: DouglasJFW

customer_reviews.title: Mighty fine bass. Great tone variety, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Mighty fine bass. Great tone variety, high quality, looks great, not much else to say really!
customer_reviews.author: The Fermentation Station

customer_reviews.title: Requires a 9-volt battery to power the output from the pickups, contrary to on
customer_reviews.text: Feels good in the hands and light enough to play comfortably for a couple of hours. Good fit and finish, no sample defects, Sounds great with supplied round wound strings. I’m not happy with how the volume knob only permits a slight volume boost or reduction. It’s as if it’s designed to work half-heartedly!
customer_reviews.author: John Gretsch

customer_reviews.title: gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: gift for my son. but I tried it out good look and great fill and good action for a bass
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: My first bass
customer_reviews.text: Well setup out of the box, been rocking on it for a month - learning. Definitely happy with my purchase. Easy to play and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: MaksV

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to have an amp that will handle an active bass.
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about this bass, a pro bass for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Fiscel

customer_reviews.title: Love this bass
customer_reviews.text: Love this bass. Has a nice clean sound with a deep tone. The strings are a little closer to the fret than I prefer, but I plan to adjust them up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cost only $200 and yet it performs like $1000 bass guitar. It's a great bass guitar.
customer_reviews.author: sunkyongkim

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful bass
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this bass. She is just learning to play - we have no complaints about the ease of play and the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Kane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent built!
customer_reviews.text: This bass has an awesome sound. I didn't go wrong with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Bass Guitar, 1 minor complaint
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this bass guitar is perfect for a beginner/intermediate player. My only complaint is rather minor: the nut needed to be slightly "sanded" by strings in order to prevent a slight buzz from occurring on certain frets. Easily fixed, sounds great! Looks beautiful too!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bass for any player. Great quality and incredible sounds. The action is smooth and the intonation is perfect. Great deal for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great look great sounds
customer_reviews.text: This bass gives me the sound I been looking for, with its lightweight, makes easy to move around with while playing, love the Yamaha technology, been playing for 40 years now had a lot of bass’s, this is the best yet!!
customer_reviews.author: tom perry

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon botched delivery, cost me a day off. Bass has good and decent sound, but pickups to close and interfere with fingerpicking.
customer_reviews.author: Frank white

customer_reviews.title: Great bass
customer_reviews.text: My only problem is that the bass can't be turned off, so when not being played the battery is still being drained, however the battery is very easy to remove and replace
customer_reviews.author: Luismartin Laguna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: It is THE most beautiful instrument I have ever seen. Its simplistic black design is so beautiful. I'm in love with it. I'm a beginner with the bass so I couldn't tell any faults or limitations of this instrument. But for $200, it really sounds and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Shubham

customer_reviews.title: Very nice guitar
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s great guitar for beginner. Sounds and fills great
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good bass!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bass guitar for a beginner who's just starting out, but a terrible bass guitar for intermediate or advanced players who want would want a little bit more for their playing credentials than just a rubber ducky.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Keith

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I got this bass to have as a backup, it plays nice and sounds great. For the money i believe i got exactly what i paid for and am happy with my purchase. The newer electronics make even a low end bass like this sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect value for a quality instrument
customer_reviews.text: Great bass! I am super happy with this purchase. The quality is high and the tone is perfect. Hardly any setup needed.
customer_reviews.author: jake geesey

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great instrument with a decent price and would be a ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great instrument with a decent price and would be a good start for beginner and intermediate bass players seeking a five string bass.
customer_reviews.author: john melchor

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a surprise gift for my brother. Almost kept it for myself. One of the top 2 basses I ever played. Tone, feel, sound options. This bass is amazing! Saving up for the 5 string version for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Burns Jr.

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED ON ARRIVAL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Carefully unboxed ...and discovered a dent on the backside. DISAPPOINTING.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little bass at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Good little bass at a great price. Just doing some recording with it, but it seems fine. Arrived on time too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Professional quality instrument for a great price! Love the EQ presets!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T. Blessington

customer_reviews.title: Keep playing!!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this bass so far. Had the model below it a while back and the sound from this one is so much better. Worth the extra money if you plan on keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: David Runkle

customer_reviews.title: This bass more than meet my expectations the a great bass real smooth sounds great and is a real ...
customer_reviews.text: This bass more than meet my expectations the a great bass real smooth sounds great and is a real reliable bass thanks Yamaha!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: This guitar drains, and I mean drains batteries, u gotta replace em almost every 2 weeks, and that’s me a beginner just playing tunes an scales for a bit every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bass is just awesome, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Musician by degree, though I had only played stand up bass previously. This bass is just awesome, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous scholar

customer_reviews.title: Best by far
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it is absolutely gorgeous to look at and to hold. Probably the best bass guitar I’ve ever touched
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is nice (trw179ew). Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: felt good, plays and sounds incredible and well worth the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived undamaged, felt good, plays and sounds incredible and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it if you're interested(follow my advice)
customer_reviews.text: An amazing active/passive bass. Very comfortable and fast to play. Great for tapping, slap, pick and finger playing. It's very versatile when it comes to genres. At first you might have difficulties getting used with the sound control but with time you'll know how to handle and craft the sound you're seeking for(but most of the quality of the sound of bass players comes from their playing). Yamaha sure knows how to make basses. For the quality of the TRBX504, I can't believe it's not that expensive. This bass is without a doubt a gem. Check out Miki Santamaria(outstanding bass player) on youtube, he uses the bass on some his videos if you want to get an idea.
customer_reviews.author: Domingo F.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Well-made Beginner Bass
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this guitar, and for the price, you get a pretty nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Parker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: As described and more . Set up easy and plays beautifully, for the price I couldn't ask for more from this bass
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken tuning key
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I purchase this Yamaha bass guitar and when I receive and open the package the tuning key was broken
customer_reviews.author: Berry

customer_reviews.title: Musically It was pretty good right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who sees the toffee apple color admires it. Musically It was pretty good right out of the box. I could have settled for it "as is". But I'm having it set up now and flat wound strings added for a more mellow tone. I have high expectations. Will add more comments later.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bass. I would give it more stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce McGovney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my first guitar and it's perfect in every way!!! Well done Yamaha!
customer_reviews.author: John Reid

customer_reviews.title: Plays Like A Dream...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bass in the 5 string Mist Green flavor. Be warned - no case. Took it over to my friend's house who's played bass semi-professionally for 25+ years and he could not believe I only payed $399.00 for this beauty. I'm a drummer turned bassist so it's a better bass than I am a bassist but it feels wonderful in my hands, the 5 way switch is no gimmick, the neck is like butter, and it plays like a dream. Why spend more?
customer_reviews.author: Tom Miller

customer_reviews.title: This Bass Will Make You Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bass for the price. Easy to play, great sustain , great sound, awesome finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bass works and sounds beautiful. Needed to be tuned but that's to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Bass works and sounds beautiful. Needed to be tuned but that's to be expected. Recieved with damage from shipping though...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, I love the finish you have, I recommend it! I arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Yilmar Macias

customer_reviews.title: Nice bass It arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Nice bass It arrived in perfect condition.. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: john hannukaine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Bass, But I dont know how to change the battery
customer_reviews.author: Rashard

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my Guitarist boyfriend who also happens to be a member of my band. He loves this bass guitar! Now practices everyday. The first one came damaged as it fell out of the box as the UPS guy tried to deliver it. So he took it back to UPS and returned it to Amazon. Amazon sent a replacement in two days. Looks good...plays great!!!
customer_reviews.author: JagArt

customer_reviews.title: Underrated awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: These basses are just amazing for the price! Perfect intonation, excellent machines, dual pickups, great sound... If you're looking for an excellent instrument on a budget, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Bozic

customer_reviews.title: Great apperance
customer_reviews.text: I am just learning the bass so can't comment on that aspect but this instrument is flat gorgeous It just has quality written all over it. I don't know if all basses had long fret boards, this one is about seven inches to long for a standard guitar soft case.
customer_reviews.author: gary w petersen

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Impressive...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bass as a beginner but I have to say I was quite impressed by how good it looked. But not more than its playability. It feels good and I look forward to learning how to play.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great value - very well made
customer_reviews.text: Superb value! This bass is really well made and the finish was spotless. Sounds great too - perfect for a beginner. Has a PB & a JB-style pickup. No pickup selector switch but a volume knob for each so the amount of each can be mixed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Graves

customer_reviews.title: Threw some new strings on it and it sounded 10 times better. Not getting any odd rattling or buzzing noises
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality bass. Threw some new strings on it and it sounded 10 times better. Not getting any odd rattling or buzzing noises. The neck is smooth and in my opinion on the thinner side.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bass
customer_reviews.text: Although my son is just learning how to play the bass, his friends that have been playing for several year have all been impressed by the looks and sound of this bass. Amazon took great care in the shipment and packaging. Love it
customer_reviews.author: cachais

customer_reviews.title: ... came way later than I was expecting I really love this bass
customer_reviews.text: Even though it came way later than I was expecting I really love this bass, it only took me like 2 min to get it all tuned up and ready to jam.. great quality, awesome sound and it looks beautiful! You won't regret your purchase I promise ;)
customer_reviews.author: E. David

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a Bass!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Bass. It stays in tune, the action is awesome, it is very comfortable to hold and with the selector switch I can get any tone I want. Yes yes yes! I can recommend this Yamaha bass.
customer_reviews.author: m425

customer_reviews.title: Great bass, beginner or not
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bass. Plays easy, good tone. Best in class for the price
customer_reviews.author: Bassdude

product_meta.title: Yamaha TRBX204 GRM 4-String Bass Guitar, Gray Metallic
product_meta.description: Style:200 Series| Size:4-String| Color:Gray MetallicAn affordable bass featuring a powerful pickup configuration. The TRBX204 has the versatility and looks to fit whatever your style and stage.
feature_bullets: The 4-control circuit includes controls for Master Volume, Balance, and a 2-band equalizer for creating a more aggressive tone.
